title.rendered: Sunwest Aviation in Calgary, Alberta, Canada

content.rendered:
Sunwest Aviation is a charter airline and fixed-base operator (FBO) based at the Calgary International Airport in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. It was established in 1986 as Sunwest Home Aviation and rebranded with the current name in 2006.

 

 

Sunwest Aviation Calgary, Alberta, Canada Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: 217 Aero Court NE
Calgary Alberta T2E 7C6, Canada

Phone: +1 (403) 275-8121
Toll Free: 1-888-291-4566

Fax: +1 (403) 275-5900

Email: charterquotes@sunwestaviation.ca

Business Hours: Open 24/7

Sunwest Shell AeroCentre and FBO Hours

Monday-Thursday: 04:00 – 22:00
Friday-Sunday: 04:00 – 21:00

Sunwest Aviation Official website: https://www.sunwestaviation.ca/

Note: Online check-in is opens from 24 hours and closes 2 hours before scheduled time of departure.

Sunwest Aviation Online Check-in: www.salamair.com/online check-in

Sunwest Aviation Baggage Allowance

View Sunwest Aviation Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage in the above link

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Sunwest Aviation

Total fleet: 31

  • Beechcraft 1900
  • Beechcraft Super King Air
  • Bombardier Challenger 300
  • Bombardier Challenger 600 series
  • Cessna Citation Sovereign
  • de Havilland Canada Dash 8
  • Fairchild Swearingen Metroliner
  • Gulfstream G150
  • Gulfstream GV-SP
  • Gulfstream G650
  • Learjet 35
  • Learjet 45
  • Piper PA-31 Navajo
  • Raytheon Hawker 800

Queries handled by Sunwest Aviation Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Sunwest Aviation Calgary, Alberta, Canada Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Sunwest Aviation Calgary, Alberta, Canada : (click on the stars below)
